Enumeration# Unicode.UTF16

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
@frozen
enum UTF16
```

## [Topics](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#Structures)

[`struct ForwardParser`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/forwardparser)A type that can be used to parse `CodeUnits` into `EncodedScalar`s.[`struct ReverseParser`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/reverseparser)A type that can be used to parse a reversed sequence of `CodeUnits` into `EncodedScalar`s.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias CodeUnit`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/codeunit)The basic unit of encoding[`typealias EncodedScalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/encodedscalar)A valid scalar value as represented in this encoding### [Type Properties](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#Type-Properties)

[`static var encodedReplacementCharacter: Unicode.UTF16.EncodedScalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/encodedreplacementcharacter)A unicode scalar value to be used when repairing encoding/decoding errors, as represented in this encoding.### [Type Methods](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#Type-Methods)

[`static func decode(Unicode.UTF16.EncodedScalar) -> Unicode.Scalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/decode(_:)-swift.type.method)Converts from encoded to encoding-independent representation[`static func encode(Unicode.Scalar) -> Unicode.UTF16.EncodedScalar?`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/encode(_:))Converts from encoding-independent to encoded representation, returning `nil` if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.[`static func isASCII(Unicode.UTF16.CodeUnit) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/isascii(_:))Returns whether the given code unit represents an ASCII scalar[`static func isLeadSurrogate(Unicode.UTF16.CodeUnit) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/isleadsurrogate(_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified code unit is a high-surrogate code unit.[`static func isSurrogate(Unicode.UTF16.CodeUnit) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/issurrogate(_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified code unit is a high or low surrogate code unit.[`static func isTrailSurrogate(Unicode.UTF16.CodeUnit) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/istrailsurrogate(_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified code unit is a low-surrogate code unit.[`static func leadSurrogate(Unicode.Scalar) -> UTF16.CodeUnit`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/leadsurrogate(_:))Returns the high-surrogate code unit of the surrogate pair representing the specified Unicode scalar.[`static func trailSurrogate(Unicode.Scalar) -> UTF16.CodeUnit`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/trailsurrogate(_:))Returns the low-surrogate code unit of the surrogate pair representing the specified Unicode scalar.[`static func transcode<FromEncoding>(FromEncoding.EncodedScalar, from: FromEncoding.Type) -> Unicode.UTF16.EncodedScalar?`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/transcode(_:from:))Converts a scalar from another encoding’s representation, returning `nil` if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.[`static func transcodedLength<Input, Encoding>(of: Input, decodedAs: Encoding.Type, repairingIllFormedSequences: Bool) -> (count: Int, isASCII: Bool)?`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/transcodedlength(of:decodedas:repairingillformedsequences:))Returns the number of UTF-16 code units required for the given code unit sequence when transcoded to UTF-16, and a Boolean value indicating whether the sequence was found to contain only ASCII characters.[`static func width(Unicode.Scalar) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16/width(_:))Returns the number of code units required to encode the given Unicode scalar.### [Default Implementations](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf16#Default-Implementations)
